jobs.name: test
jobs.query: SELECT TOP 5 s.student_id, s.first_name, s.last_name, c.name AS college, d.name AS department, s.email, s.enrolled_year FROM dbo.students s JOIN dbo.colleges c ON s.college_id = c.college_id JOIN dbo.departments d ON s.department_id = d.department_id ORDER BY s.student_id;

jobs.name: Create Excel
jobs.query: SELECT TOP 500 s.student_id, s.first_name, s.last_name, c.name AS college, d.name AS department, s.email, s.enrolled_year FROM dbo.students s JOIN dbo.colleges c ON s.college_id = c.college_id JOIN dbo.departments d ON s.department_id = d.department_id ORDER BY s.student_id;
